quotes.quote: The most important part to keeping us intimidating is being physical overall. If they know one of us is coming, they're going to brace themselves for a hard hit.
They're intimidating the networks and levying these fines, so the networks are not sure of what they can or can't do.
The intimidating part is not his speed. It's how different it is, how much the ball moves. It looks like it's coming at you. Then you lose it.
It can be intimidating, but once you're there, you realize no one is looking at you. You realize that not everyone is in great shape they're coming to the gym to get fit, too.
The real intimidating stuff is the scene where you show up for the first day. You kind of square off, and that is where you look each other in the eye.
Behind intimidating messages are simply people appealing to us to meet their needs.
The whole concept of negotiating is intimidating to many people.
How guilt once harbour'd in the conscious breast, Intimidates the brave, degrades the great.
If a team intimidate you physically and you let them, they've won.
If you let a bully intimidate you, he's going to do it again. You've got to stand up to these strong-arm tactics.
Some venues are more intimidating than others, but as professional players you enjoy the intimidating places more than the other kind.
Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
Don't be intimidated by power, wealth or station, character alone makes all the difference.
A man who is intimate with God will never be intimidated by men.
Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
Once you've found something you know how to do, it makes you feel you don't have to be intimidated by someone.
Good hitters don't become intimidated. They become infuriated.
There is nothing to be intimidated about - it's just another long run where a few more people show up and they happen to wear numbers.
If you've got them by the balls, their hearts and minds will follow.
The ones who hate me the most are the ones who don't scare me.
The strongest intimidation, by the way, is the invention of a hereafter with a hell everlasting.
If you spend all your time thinking about how someone is going to one-up you, you can't put your best foot forward.
Never be intimidated by what seems ominous, for big is only an accumulation of many smalls.
Straightforwardness intimidates people. They prefer the veneer, despite what they claim.
The trouble with scary people is everyone's too scared to tell them how scary they are
Ocean is not supposed to be scared of the drops.
A man of your valor deserves not another breath.
What may intimidate a man is a woman who thinks with her mind before she feels with her heart. Nevertheless what determines the strength in the man is his ability to accept one when he sees one.
A nervous silence loosens tongues
Somebody thinking that they can make noise intimidate me is comical.
When you see something that's so excellent it can be intimidating to walk into it no matter how many people you know.
If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid.
The only thing more intimidating than a huge international film star is your mother-in-law.
Directing can be very lonely and quite intimidating.
Don't be intimidated by what you don't know.
A man who cannot be enticed by money or intimidated by the threat of jail or death has two of the strongest weapons that anyone has to offer.
